titleStmt.title: Whereas it hath pleased Almighty God to call to his mercie our late souereigne lord, King Iames, of blessed memory, by whose decease the imperiall crownes of Great Britaine, France, and Ireland, are solely and rightfully come to the high and mighty Prince Charles

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill ...,

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first four lines of text.
Announces accession of Charles I.--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
